messages.content: Create a new github repository named new_project, and invite all collaborators in emmajohnson/image_transformation as the collaborators.

<function_thought>
To accomplish the user's request, I will create a new GitHub repository named "new_project" first. After that, I will retrieve the information of the repository "emmajohnson/image_transformation" to find out the existing collaborators and invite them to the new repository. 
</function_thought>

<function_call>[git_create_repo(repo_name="new_project"), get_github_repository_information(repo_name="emmajohnson/image_transformation")]</function_call>

<final_answer>
